entity.name: composites
entity.query: SELECT id, name FROM composites WHERE type='Condition' AND ('${dataimporter.request.clean}' != 'false' OR updated_at > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}')

entity.name: group
entity.query: SELECT name FROM composites WHERE id IN (SELECT parent_id FROM groupings WHERE child_id='${composites.id}')

entity.name: species
entity.query: SELECT properties.value FROM composites_properties, vocabulary_entries, properties WHERE composites_properties.composite_id='${composites.id}' AND properties.id=composites_properties.property_id AND properties.`key`=vocabulary_entries.`key` AND properties.`key`='species'

entity.name: perturbation
entity.query: SELECT vocabulary_entries.`key`, vocabulary_entries.vocab_type FROM vocabulary_entries, composites_properties, properties WHERE composites_properties.composite_id='${composites.id}' AND properties.id=composites_properties.property_id AND properties.`key`=vocabulary_entries.`key` AND composites_properties.is_observation=1

entity.name: measurement
entity.query: SELECT properties.value FROM vocabulary_entries, composites_properties, properties WHERE composites_properties.composite_id='${composites.id}' AND properties.id=composites_properties.property_id AND properties.`key`=vocabulary_entries.`key` AND vocabulary_entries.vocab_type='measurement'

entity.name: property
entity.query: SELECT p.key as p_key, p.value as p_value FROM properties p, composites_properties cp WHERE cp.composite_id='${composites.id}' AND p.id=cp.property_id
